comment: He just retired this semester, so I don't need to write this but I feel like I owe it. He is simply an amazing human being and an incredible professor. He is the prof I will look back on as being an impact in my life. Funny, down to earth, wise, incredible lectures, he taught about Physiological Psych in life, not just lectures. He is a great guy.

Currently in his class right now and I have never felt more drawn to rate him. He makes lectures very interesting and jokes a lot. He has a lot of knowledge about a wide range of subjects but loves to rant about everything and anything. Macmillian Learning textbook is long and wordy but the assignments aren't too hard. Would definitely recommend.

Knows how to teach and entertain. Has a ton of relevant experience and stories to go along with the class content. We used revel for quizzes and exams are on D2L. You never know what chaotic thing he will say next which makes every lecture fun and relaxed. Go to class, pay attention, don't miss assignments, and you will have no problem getting an A

I've taken Dr. Schwartz for psychopharmacology and physiology. He is hands down the best professor I have had. He has great lectures and is very understanding. He really cares about his students and wants the best for them. If you have the chance to take his class, do it!

I felt as if i could not ask questions, or give an opposite view point. It was clear that i was given the impression that i could not challenge or debate and it was very discouraging feeling guilty trying to learn more. I felt like i was not allowed to express myself and as a result i could not bring myself to be there if I cant question. No use
It was an in-person class but I never went bc he didn't count attendance. You do weekly work on revel and have a couple of exams. Everything can be found pretty easily lol.

During his lectures he always has funny stories to tell. He truly cares about students and wants to make it easier on us. Three exams and then textbook activities through Pearson. Willing to give more time on exams too. Take him!!!

Dr. Schwartz is a nice guy but a subpar professor. The course is content heavy and while he just reads off the ppt, he tries to connect his personal stories to the lesson but just ends up eating up all the class time. He jokes a lot (sometimes too much) and youll end up having to teach yourself everything. Textbook and quizzes are on launchpad

If Professor Schwartz taught any other course, I would absolutely take them with him. He brings such a funny, witty and relatable attitude to his lectures that many other professors lack. His course is one that fosters a laid-back but engaging atmosphere and he knows how to make the material interesting. Overall, he is a great teacher and person.

Literally the most hilarious professor on campus hands down. He makes class very interesting and is super understanding. He does tend to call people out so if you are not comfortable with that I would thicken your skin a bit before taking this class lol. Only complaint is that there are only 3 tests that account for your grade plus attendance

Honestly, best professor I have ever taken and I highly recommended him for Psychopharmacology! He only has 3 exams and they are all open notes/open book and he leaves them open for about a week to complete. He is so funny in lectures and makes class fun. Attendance is mandatory but he is understanding if you email him why you can't make it. AMAZIN

He's a funny guy but doesn't do his part as a professor. He doesn't grade any of the assignments you have to do so you're left guessing what your grade will be. He just puts in 100s at the end of the semester cause he's too lazy to actually grade. Going to class is a waste of time I didn't learn a thing. It's an easy A though all tests are online.

Dr. Schwartz is a great guy and likable. However, he tended to joke around to the point of the class being disrupted. He taught in a choppy way and I could hardly follow along. Never graded our online assignments. The material is complex and hard to understand and his teaching style does not help in understanding it at all. Do not recommend.
Loved Dr. Schwartz. Super easy class and you rarely have to go. All the tests are online and simple. Funny guy but can go to far sometimes unintentionally which can be uncomfortable.

Easy. Grades are: Tests online , and online homework you can finish in 2 minutes. Could easily get an A in this class without even looking at notes or going to class. Except he takes attendance occasionally and is ten percent of your grade. He's funny but his opinions are a little much sometimes.
THIS GUY! He is literally the best teacher I have had. His test are online as well as the quizzes. I hold him so highly. He just understands people.

if you are lucky enough to take him, do it. every grade he gives you including tests is online and literally tells you he expects you to cheat on them. he is one of the funniest people and jokes around with everyone in the class. and if you put in minimal effort you actually end up learning too. best teacher hands down wish i could take him again.

I love Professor Schwartz!! His lectures are interesting and he is very funny.  He cares for his students. Assignments & tests are online and are extremely easy. He takes attendance randomly. He makes the class very easy, not hard to get an A
He is a really good teacher, who really cares about his students. He takes attendance randomly, but his class is worth going to.

Mr. Schwartz really does care about the students and teaches in a very relaxed way. I just go to class to see what he has to say because he's such a neat guy. Easy class to get an A if you need it, but his exams are 100 questions long. He gave my class all 100s on the first exam because he couldn't upload it.

Real funny guy! He wants every one of his students to pass too. He's real understanding that we have other classes and wants to make it as easy as possible. Theres a lot of homework due online before each class, but it's real easy stuff that you can literally finish in 10 minutes. All tests are online, and he encourages you to use your resources.

Dr. Schwartz is a nice guy. He's funny and can be really entertaining. He also pushes the line all the time making inappropriate jokes towards students. His class was a breeze to take. Easy A with minimal effort. But did I really learn anything? No. Take it if you enjoy crass humor and gaining nothing but a grade for your money.
He is a great professor, one of the best. Take his class. you learn a lot and will get an A.
Awesome person! I would come to class and get my therapy. He is very intelligent and knowledgeable about the information he teaches. I wish he taught more classes.
Great professor who is new to KSU. I had him for Physio on a Friday so of course the lectures were long. He's funny though. Tests are multiple choice and TF. Easy though. I would take him again
